meanings.sent1: The servos in the robot help it move its arms and legs.
meanings.sent2: I need to adjust the servos in my remote-controlled car to make it turn better.
meanings.sent3: The servos in the toy robot started dancing unexpectedly, much to the amusement of the children.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a set of malfunctioning servos, erratic and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The servos in the machine hummed softly as they adjusted the position of the robotic arm.

meanings.definition: A servomechanism used in model aircraft to control the flaps and rudder.
meanings.sent1: The tiny servos in the model airplane helped it steer smoothly through the air.
meanings.sent2: Pilots rely on precise servos to control the movements of their model aircraft.
meanings.sent3: The servos in the toy plane decided to have a race with the propeller, much to the surprise of the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the intricate system of servos in a model aircraft, carefully adjusting her thoughts and actions.
meanings.sent5: The servos in the small plane clicked and whirred as they responded to the pilot's commands.
